snippet: Football federations are "overwhelmingly in favor" of expanding the existing 32-nation World Cup, FIFA President Gianni Infantino said on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Football federations are "overwhelmingly in favor" of expanding the existing 32-nation World Cup, FIFA President Gianni Infantino said on Wednesday.

headline.main: FIFA Boss Says Football Federations Back Expanded World Cup
headline.print_headline: FIFA Boss Says Football Federations Back Expanded World Cup
